channel.title: Pangaea - MR. ANDERSON
channel.description:
https://soundcloud.com/mrandersonauxy/01-pangaea
I'm back! After a month or so of writer's block, I've put together a four-track EP. This is the first release. The official release date for the full EP is March 30, marking the 1-year anniversary of my Soundcloud, so stay tuned!

item.title: Pangaea - MR. ANDERSON

item.description:
Thanks! It was a blast to make.

item.title: Pangaea - MR. ANDERSON

item.description:
